title: Theeraadhae Aasaigal Lyrics Orange Mittai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Theeraadhae Aasaigal
Singer(s): Justin Prabhakaran & Karthik
Movie: Orange Mittai (2015)
Lyrics: Justin Prabhakaran

Theeraadhey aasaigal,
nadhi yengum mazhai vaanam naan
oyaadhey osaigal,
alaipaayum kadal oram dhan
naan pogum saalaigal,
mudiyaadha neelangal

Theeraadhey en aasaigaley
oyaadhey en osaigaley
neeladho en saalaigaley
vegu dhooram poi vara

Theeraadhey aasaigal,
nadhi yengum mazhai vaanam naan
oyaadhey osaigal,
alaipaayum kadal oram dhan

Siragugal illa paravayai kandaen vaanin meedheley
Nilavugal illa iravinai kandaen thongum podhiley
vidhi ennum veedhiyil, nadanthu naan pogiren
Idhu pogum paadhai yaarodhaan arivaar sol

Theeraadhey en aasaigaley
oyaadhey en osaigaley
neeladho en saalaigaley
vegu dhooram poi vara

Mudivugal ellam mudindhida illai,
Â irudhiyil thodangidathan
Idindhadhu ellam udaindhida illai,
inaindhidum vazhi irundhal
Marandhidum Nyabagam tholaindhidum thedal dhan
Karai illa kadalin alaiyai naan varuveney

Theeraadhey en aasaigaley
oyaadhey en osaigaley
neeladho en saalaigaley
vegu dhooram poi vara

Theeraadhey aasaigal,
nadhi yengum mazhai vaanam naan
oyaadhey osaigal,
alaipaayum kadal oram dhan
naan pogum saalaigal,
mudiyaadha neelangal
